meeting_info.organization: City Council Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee

agenda_items.title: Executive Session Notice
agenda_items.description: A closed executive session may be held if the discussion of any of the above agenda items concerns one of the following: seeking the advice of its attorney about pending or contemplated litigation, deliberating the purchase, exchange, lease, or value of real property, deliberating a negotiated contract for a prospective gift or donation, deliberating the appointment, employment, evaluation, reassignment, duties, discipline, or dismissal of a public officer or employee, deliberating the deployment of security personnel or devices, discussing commercial or financial information from a business prospect, or deliberating security assessments or deployments.
